infoparam.name: List of all parameters of an Avatar SMD transition
List of all parameters of an Avatar SMD transition
List of all parameters of an Avatar SMD transition
List of all parameters of an Avatar SMD transition
UML Note
infoparam.value:
you only need to start keyexchange from one of the clients.
advertise_client_id(y) = will advertise the client id as "y" to the server
start_key_exchange(x) = initiates the DH key exchange with the client x. y->x
if exchange is not done, the messages are sent in plain text

Line.value: you only need to start keyexchange from one of the clients.
advertise_client_id(y) = will advertise the client id as "y" to the server
start_key_exchange(x) = initiates the DH key exchange with the client x.
if exchange is not done, the messages are sent in plain text
